@graph.name: sRNA Seq Step 1: Read Pre Processing And Removal Of Artifacts (no Grooming)
@graph.description:
This workflow completes the first part of the small RNA-seq tutorial from read pre-processing to trimming.e

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Differential abundance testing of small RNAs](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/transcriptomics/tutorials/srna/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
